Directory: ui/

.pro files

hiihat_classify_ask_params.pro

Routine to query user for image segmentation parameters.

hiihat_endmember_ask_params.pro

Query user for endmember detection parameters

hiihat_event_apply_metric.pro

Event callback for learn metric menu option.

hiihat_event_autoclass.pro

Event callback for autoclass menu option.

hiihat_event_config_reload.pro

Event callback for reload config file menu option.

hiihat_event_config_save.pro

Event callback for save configuration menu option.

hiihat_event_find_neutral.pro

Event callback for neutral region detection function

hiihat_event_get_superpixel_endmembers.pro

Event callback for superpixel endmember detection menu option.

hiihat_event_help.pro

Event callback for learn metric menu option.

hiihat_event_learn_metric.pro

Event callback for learn metric menu option.

hiihat_event_mean_image.pro

Event callback for mean image calculation menu option.

hiihat_event_preprocess.pro

Event callback for preprocessing menu option.

hiihat_event_segment.pro

Event callback for image segmentation menu option.

hiihat_learn_metric_ask_params.pro

Routine to query user for metric learning parameters.

hiihat_menu.pro

This is a placeholder function neccessary because IDL requires each source file to contain a function by the same name as the file in order for the resolve_routine function (used to rebuild HiiHAT) to work properly.

hiihat_preprocess_ask_params.pro

GUI wrapper for querying parameters specific to hiihat_preprocess function

hiihat_segment_ask_params.pro

Routine to query user for image segmentation parameters.

hiihat_transform_ask_params.pro

Select a pre-computed transformation matrix for application to a known image format
